mapper.select: SELECT PRO_ID, PRO_QID, QA_TITLE, PRO_WRITER, PRO_ANSWERER, PRO_DEADLINE, PRO_PAY, PRO_PROCESS, PRO_STATUS FROM QA, PROGRESS PRO WHERE QA.QA_ID = PRO.PRO_QID AND PRO_STATUS != 'X' AND (PRO_WRITER = #{ nickname } OR PRO_ANSWERER = #{ nickname })
SELECT * FROM QA, PROGRESS PRO WHERE QA.QA_ID = PRO.PRO_QID AND PRO_ID = #{ pro_id }
SELECT NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME = #{ nickname } AND MSTATUS = 'Y'
SELECT QA_ID FROM QA WHERE QA_TITLE = #{qa_title}

SELECT PRO_ID, PRO_QID, QA_TITLE, PRO_WRITER, PRO_ANSWERER, PRO_DEADLINE, PRO_PAY, PRO_PROCESS, PRO_STATUS FROM QA, PROGRESS PRO WHERE QA.QA_ID = PRO.PRO_QID AND PRO_ANSWERER = #{ nickname } AND PRO_STATUS = 'W'
mapper.update: UPDATE PROGRESS SET PRO_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE PRO_ID = #{ r_pro_id }
UPDATE PROGRESS SET PRO_STATUS = 'D' WHERE PRO_ID = #{ r_pro_id }
UPDATE PROGRESS SET PRO_STATUS = 'N' WHERE PRO_DEADLINE < TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AND (PRO_STATUS = 'Y' OR PRO_STATUS = 'W')
